long_description: New to kiting or an experienced stuntsman? This all-around kite is non-stop fun and packs small to take with you anywhere. Now go fly a kite! Ripstop nylon and mylar laminate sails are tough and light for long-lasting performance--Kevlar reinforced nose for unplanned landings. Pultruded carbon spars assemble quickly and are extremely durable. High-strength and abrasion-resistant Spectra line keeps you flying your kite, not chasing it. Wrist straps, line and non-slip bridles are color coded for no-hassle set-up. Pieces pack up for travel into a compact zippered sleeve under 28 inches in length--instructions are printed inside sleeve so you won't lose them. Responds instantly and is easy to control in 3-25mph winds with a light to moderate pull and fast speed--great for adults and kids age 9 and up. Set includes: convertible travel case, 90# x 85 foot Spectra lines, winder, flight straps, kite and complete instructions.
short_description: New to kiting or an experienced stuntsman? This all-around kite is non-stop fun and packs small to take with you anywhere. Now go fly a kite!
